The '2012 [[Atlanta Braves]] season' was the Braves' 16th season of home games
at Turner Field, 47th season in Atlanta, and 137th season of the franchise.
After a late season collapse in 2011 kept the Braves from the playoffs, the team
returned to the postseason for the second time in three seasons as a Wild Card
team, with a record of 94-68. They lost to the St. Louis Cardinals in the one-
game Wild Card Playoff.
categories: National League Wild Card champion seasons
